Reviews.Title: HONEYWELL VIDEO HF41648P4T0N 16CH FUSION IV PLUS PERFORMACE PKG 4000GB
Reviews.Author: troy osburn
Reviews.Content: There are 2 styles to this video recorder.  The first has bigger dimensions all around---HONEYWELL HF41648P4T0N 16CH FUSION IV NVR PLUS PERFORMACE PKG 4000GB The second is rev b and has a smaller face and more slimmer all around appearanceHONEYWELL HF41648P4T0N 16CH REV B FUSION IV NVR PLUS PERFORMACE PKG 4000GB  I FOUND THIS PARTICULAR MODEL (HF41648P4T0N rev b)IN THE RANGE OF 9500$ TO 17,0000$http://www.honeywellvideo.com/documents/L_FUSN4NVRD_D.pdf  GOOD RECORDER FROM HONEYWELLhttp://www.securitystoreusa.com/SearchResults.asp?searching=Y&sort;=13&brand;=Honeywell&minprice;=9940&show;=200http://www.monstermarketplace.com/surveillence-equipment/honeywell-video-hf41648p4t0n-16ch-fusion-iv-plus-performace-pkg-4000gb

ProductInfo.Features:
honeywell fusion IV nvr Rev B-performance plus SURVEILLANCE 4000gb storage 16ch video surveillance recorder
dimensions 27"x19"x3.5"
Fusion Server Software, HFRVS Remote View Software, HFVMS Video Management Software
keyboard all software manuals and installation instructions
2 YEAR WARRANTY
ProductInfo.Name: HONEYWELL VIDEO HF41648P4T0N 16CH FUSION IV PLUS PERFORMACE PKG 4000GB
